definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Because our triune God is the God of all grace.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們的三位一體神是充滿恩典的神。

sentences.english: The holy trinity is located in the center and is surrounded by apostles and saints.
sentences.chinese: 三位一體位於壁畫中央，十二門徒和諸聖分列四周。

sentences.english: The Old Testament is as explicit about the Trinity and the deity of the Messiah as is the New Testament.
sentences.chinese: 舊約是關於三位一體和明確的彌賽亞神象新約。

sentences.english: Conclusion Trinity is cure and nursing paraquat intoxication of patients with effective method.
sentences.chinese: 結論三位一體是救治及理百草枯中毒患者的有效方法。

sentences.english: God is trinity, but how can we say that he is one?
sentences.chinese: 上帝是三位一體，我們又怎能說他是一位呢？

sentences.english: Even the Toleration Act of 1689 excepted anti-Trinitarians.
sentences.chinese: 甚至1689年的容忍法也排除了反三位一體主義者。

sentences.english: Delaware required an oath affirming belief in the Trinity.
sentences.chinese: 特拉華州則要求發誓相信三位一體的宗教信仰原則。

sentences.english: Which three till now never kept seat in one.
sentences.chinese: 如今聚一人身上才三位一體。

sentences.english: That has been my experience at Trinity.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我在三位一體教堂體驗到的情形。

sentences.english: Jesus christ is the only-Begotten beloved Son of God the Father, and is the second Person of the Trinity.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌基督是父神的獨生愛子，是三位一體神的第二位。

sentences.english: What good does it do to speak learnedly about the Trinity if, lacking humility, you displease the Trinity?
sentences.chinese: 他如果缺少謙卑的心，就不能蒙三位一體上帝的喜悅。

sentences.english: That's the connection between that trinity and the Alexandrian Library.
sentences.chinese: 那是三位一體和亞歷山大圖書館之間的連結。

sentences.english: Mark the union of the Three Divine Persons in all their gracious acts.
sentences.chinese: 三位一體的上帝是同尊同榮，不分輊軒。

sentences.english: A 3-part series on the persons and work of the Triune God, based upon the Apostles' Creed.
sentences.chinese: 基於使徒信經，三位一體神的位格及其分工的3系列。

sentences.english: The three form an organic whole, and not one of them can be dispensed with.
sentences.chinese: 這是三位一體的方針，三者不可缺一。

sentences.english: From all these reasons, "the loose Trinity" big mediation is the best choice.
sentences.chinese: 所以說，“鬆散型三位一體”大調解是最好的選擇。

definition: to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
to agree without prior consultation/to happen to hold the same view
see 承前啟後|承前启后[cheng2 qian2 qi3 hou4]
